thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 26 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: W. R. Grace Says Lower Supply, Caused By U.S. Sanctions On Russia & Increased Environmental Restrictions In China Helped In Escalating Vanadium Prices

author: Reuters Editorial
title: W. R. Grace Says Lower Supply, Caused By U.S. Sanctions On Russia & Increased Environmental Restrictions In China Helped In Escalating Vanadium Prices
text:
April 26 (Reuters) - W. R. Grace & Co:
* W. R. GRACE - LOWER SUPPLY, CAUSED BY U.S. SANCTIONS ON RUSSIA & INCREASED ENVIRONMENTAL RESTRICTIONS IN CHINA, HELPED IN ESCALATING VANADIUM PRICES
* W. R. GRACE & CO - HAS EXPERIENCED A SIGNIFICANT INCREASE IN PRODUCTION COSTS FOR SUPER DESOX AND SUPER DESOX OCI ADDITIVES
* W. R. GRACE & CO - WILL INSTITUTE A SURCHARGE OF $0.35 PER POUND ON PRICE OF ITS SULFUR OXIDES REDUCTION ADDITIVES
* W. R. GRACE & CO - HAS SECURED VANADIUM SUPPLY TO ENSURE NO SUPPLY DISRUPTIONS TO OUR CUSTOMERS
* W. R. GRACE & CO - INCREASED DEMAND FOR FERROVANADIUM FOR STEEL PRODUCTION HAS ALSO HELPED IN ESCALATING VANADIUM PRICES Source text for Eikon:
